job_details.Vacaturetitel: Exam Developer with focus on AI Engineering
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As an Exam Developer, you coordinate all activities related to developing new exams, translating existing exams to several different languages, updating the exams to current standards during maintenance, and implementing exam products in various systems. Additionally, you review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis. You work on all exams that form part of EXIN's certification portfolio.

   Importantly, you will collaborate closely with the Exam Developers to integrate generative AI solutions into our processes. You can translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms while maintaining legal, qualitative, and ethical compliance in the outcomes. You stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning.

Where you come in

   You are part of a committed team of Exam Developers, working closely with the Product Owner to ensure that the products in EXIN's certification portfolio are aligned with the needs of the market. You coordinate work with the Exam Developers and with small groups of international subject matter experts or third parties., * Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing, and maintaining exam products
     * Ensuring deliverables are in line with high-quality standards, within budget, and delivered on time
     * (Co)developing and improving exam products in line with guidelines for educational measurement
     * Testing exam products (exams and corresponding materials) for the other team members
     * Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms complying with standards, best practices, and company policies
     * Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions on the content of the exams
     * Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
     * Keeping your knowledge in the domain up-to-date
     * Representing EXIN through attending (online) events

   What's in it for you?

   You get the opportunity to further develop your exam-related skills and experience in generative AI, your language skills, and your project management skills. You are part of a strong, hard-working team, that has lots of fun along the way. We offer you the opportunity to join us in creating a healthier digital world. At EXIN, you can make a difference by helping people skill up and be the right fit for their (next) job and by helping organizations ensure they can trust they have the right people on board to deliver their (digital) strategies.

   If you share our belief that independent assessment of knowledge and competencies must be critical for a healthier digital world, you'll be at the heart of progress at EXIN. We offer a role with a great deal of variety, which means you have the opportunity to develop new skills. You'll also have possibilities for continuous learning and access to unique knowledge. Once the exam development processes are including generative AI, you can finetune these and help other teams with their generative AI-related requests.

   You will work in an environment of fun, diverse, and highly educated people. Work schedules are flexible and many of us successfully plan around our young families. Our organization structure is flat, providing room for your initiatives and ideas., Applicants must submit a CV and motivation letter in English. Applications without these documents will not be considered.
   Software Improvement Group

   Software is het DNA van onze samenleving geworden
   Dankzij software werkt inmiddels bijna elk apparaat, elk proces en elke toepassing in ons dagelijks leven. Het maakt ook werken en ondernemen makkelijker en interessanter. En we gaan ervan uit dat het allemaal nog sneller, eenvoudiger en veiliger wordt. Dat is een uitdaging voor veel bedrijven en organisaties.
   Softwarekwaliteit moet nog een inhaalslag maken
   Om…

   Software is het DNA van onze samenleving geworden
   Dankzij software werkt inmiddels bijna elk apparaat, elk proces en elke toepassing in ons dagelijks leven. Het maakt ook werken en ondernemen makkelijker en interessanter. En we gaan ervan uit dat het allemaal nog sneller, eenvoudiger en veiliger wordt. Dat is een uitdaging voor veel bedrijven en organisaties.

   Softwarekwaliteit moet nog een inhaalslag maken
   Om aan de vraag te kunnen voldoen, is veel software in de loop van de tijd ongecontroleerd doorontwikkeld. Waardoor het voor organisaties duur is in onderhoud, weinig flexibel en kwetsbaar. Zo wordt software eerder een belemmering dan aanjager van betere bedrijfsresultaten.

   SIG gelooft dat software beter kan
   Daarmee bedoelen we: software die organisaties helpt hun doelen te realiseren. Die meebeweegt met de veranderende wensen van de markt en de samenleving. Daarom werken we aan betere softwarekwaliteit, wereldwijd. We willen de kwaliteit van de softwareindustrie verbeteren door bij te dragen aan internationale standaarden. We weten hoe we softwarekwaliteit moeten meten. En we weten hoe organisaties méér uit software kunnen halen.
   IT
   Amsterdam
   100 employees
job_details.full_text:
Exam Developer with focus on AI Engineering

As an Exam Developer, you coordinate all activities related to developing new exams, translating existing exams to several different languages, updating the exams to current standards during maintenance, and implementing exam products in various systems. Additionally, you review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis. You work on all exams that form part of EXIN's certification portfolio.

   Importantly, you will collaborate closely with the Exam Developers to integrate generative AI solutions into our processes. You can translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms while maintaining legal, qualitative, and ethical compliance in the outcomes. You stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning.

Where you come in

   You are part of a committed team of Exam Developers, working closely with the Product Owner to ensure that the products in EXIN's certification portfolio are aligned with the needs of the market. You coordinate work with the Exam Developers and with small groups of international subject matter experts or third parties., * Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing, and maintaining exam products
     * Ensuring deliverables are in line with high-quality standards, within budget, and delivered on time
     * (Co)developing and improving exam products in line with guidelines for educational measurement
     * Testing exam products (exams and corresponding materials) for the other team members
     * Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms complying with standards, best practices, and company policies
     * Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions on the content of the exams
     * Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
     * Keeping your knowledge in the domain up-to-date
     * Representing EXIN through attending (online) events

   What's in it for you?

   You get the opportunity to further develop your exam-related skills and experience in generative AI, your language skills, and your project management skills. You are part of a strong, hard-working team, that has lots of fun along the way. We offer you the opportunity to join us in creating a healthier digital world. At EXIN, you can make a difference by helping people skill up and be the right fit for their (next) job and by helping organizations ensure they can trust they have the right people on board to deliver their (digital) strategies.

   If you share our belief that independent assessment of knowledge and competencies must be critical for a healthier digital world, you'll be at the heart of progress at EXIN. We offer a role with a great deal of variety, which means you have the opportunity to develop new skills. You'll also have possibilities for continuous learning and access to unique knowledge. Once the exam development processes are including generative AI, you can finetune these and help other teams with their generative AI-related requests.

   You will work in an environment of fun, diverse, and highly educated people. Work schedules are flexible and many of us successfully plan around our young families. Our organization structure is flat, providing room for your initiatives and ideas., Applicants must submit a CV and motivation letter in English. Applications without these documents will not be considered.
   Software Improvement Group

   Software is het DNA van onze samenleving geworden
   Dankzij software werkt inmiddels bijna elk apparaat, elk proces en elke toepassing in ons dagelijks leven. Het maakt ook werken en ondernemen makkelijker en interessanter. En we gaan ervan uit dat het allemaal nog sneller, eenvoudiger en veiliger wordt. Dat is een uitdaging voor veel bedrijven en organisaties.

   Om…

profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes integrating generative AI solutions into exam development processes, including fine-tuning and assisting with GenAI requests. It involves translating internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms and staying updated on AI/ML research, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

phrases.phrase: aligning technical solutions with strategic goals
phrases.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding the broader business context and ensuring technical work supports business objectives.

phrases.phrase: aligned with the needs of the market
phrases.justification: Indicates a need to understand market demands and ensure products meet those requirements.

phrases.phrase: helping organizations ensure they can trust they have the right people on board to deliver their (digital) strategies
phrases.justification: This highlights the business impact and strategic importance of the certification portfolio.

job_tasks.justification: While the role involves AI and ML, there are no explicit mentions of designing, building, or maintaining data pipelines or infrastructure for data collection, cleaning, preprocessing, or feature engineering.

phrases.phrase: integrate generative AI solutions into our processes
phrases.justification: Directly refers to the application and integration of generative AI models.

phrases.phrase: translate existing exams to several different languages
phrases.justification: This could involve using or fine-tuning language models for translation tasks.

phrases.phrase: updating the exams to current standards
phrases.justification: Implies adapting or retraining models to meet new standards.

phrases.phrase: review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis
phrases.justification: While analysis is mentioned, the core is about the models/algorithms used for exam generation and quality assessment.

phrases.phrase: translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms
phrases.justification: This involves creating or adapting algorithms based on specific rules and guidelines.

phrases.phrase: stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning
phrases.justification: Indicates a need to understand and potentially implement new modeling techniques.

phrases.phrase: Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms
phrases.justification: Explicitly states the task of developing and maintaining ML algorithms.

phrases.phrase: performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
phrases.justification: This can involve analyzing model performance and identifying issues.

phrases.phrase: finetune these and help other teams with their generative AI-related requests
phrases.justification: Directly mentions fine-tuning generative AI models and supporting others with GenAI tasks.

phrases.phrase: implementing exam products in various systems
phrases.justification: Suggests integrating AI-driven exam products into existing systems.

phrases.phrase: integrate generative AI solutions into our processes
phrases.justification: This involves building and integrating AI capabilities into workflows and potentially user-facing systems.

phrases.phrase: maintaining machine learning algorithms complying with standards, best practices, and company policies
phrases.justification: Suggests a need for robust processes to ensure algorithms are maintained according to standards.

phrases.phrase: Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products
phrases.justification: Implies monitoring and troubleshooting deployed models/systems.

phrases.phrase: performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
phrases.justification: This is a key aspect of operational maintenance and improvement of systems.

phrases.phrase: coordinate all activities related to developing new exams
phrases.justification: Requires coordination and communication with various stakeholders.

phrases.phrase: collaborate closely with the Exam Developers
phrases.justification: Directly mentions collaboration with team members.

phrases.phrase: work closely with the Product Owner
phrases.justification: Indicates collaboration with product management.

phrases.phrase: coordinate work with the Exam Developers and with small groups of international subject matter experts or third parties
phrases.justification: Highlights coordination and collaboration with diverse groups.

phrases.justification: Emphasizes working with external entities.

phrases.justification: Requires clear communication to address customer inquiries.

phrases.phrase: work in an environment of fun, diverse, and highly educated people
phrases.justification: Suggests the need for effective interaction within a diverse team.

phrases.phrase: stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning
phrases.justification: Directly states the need for continuous learning in a rapidly evolving field.

phrases.justification: Emphasizes the importance of staying current.

phrases.justification: Explicitly mentions opportunities for ongoing learning.

phrases.justification: Involves analyzing data to identify quality issues.

phrases.justification: Directly addresses identifying and solving problems.
